title: [K-12] Design and Evaluation of Mobile Language Education Based on Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Practical Work Experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with modular content delivered 3 times weekly for 30 minutes.

learning_goals: Learners can complete two weekly language projects by integrating mobile apps with offline activities in a blended learning environment.
Learners can submit language assignments incorporating peer feedback with over 80% completion accuracy using digital/in-person collaboration tools.
Learners can achieve a 25% or greater improvement in pre-post language proficiency assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
